targets.query: SELECT "n_users" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "uptime_format" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "path" = '/var/run' AND "device" =~ /^$Disk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device"
SELECT mean("degrees") FROM "temperature" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "sensor" =~ /^$Sensor$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "sensor" fill(null)

SELECT TOP("count","src_ip",10) FROM (SELECT count("action") FROM "autogen"."tail_ip_block_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "action" = 'block' AND "direction" = 'in') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "src_ip") WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT TOP("count","src_ip",10) FROM (SELECT count("action") FROM "autogen"."tail_ip_block_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "action" = 'block' AND "direction" = 'out') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "src_ip") WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT count("action") FROM "ip_block_log" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "GeoIP"
SELECT TOP("count","src_ip",10) FROM (SELECT count("domain") FROM "autogen"."tail_dnsbl_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "src_ip") WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT TOP("count","tld",10) FROM (SELECT count("domain") FROM "autogen"."tail_dnsbl_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "tld") WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT TOP("blocked",10),src_ip,dest_ip, dest_port FROM
(
SELECT count("action") as "blocked" FROM "autogen"."tail_ip_block_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "action" = 'block' AND "direction" = 'in' and protocolid =~ /^(6$|17$)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY src_ip,dest_ip,dest_port
)  WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT TOP("blocked",10),dest_port FROM
(
SELECT count("action") as "blocked" FROM "autogen"."tail_ip_block_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "action" = 'block' AND "direction" = 'in' and protocolid =~ /^(6$|17$)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dest_port
)  WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT count(*) FROM "tail_dnsbl_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "feed_name"

SELECT TOP("blocked",10),dest_port FROM
(
SELECT count("action") as "blocked" FROM "autogen"."tail_ip_block_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "action" = 'block' AND "direction" = 'out' and protocolid =~ /^(6$|17$)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dest_port
)  WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT TOP("blocked",10),src_ip,dest_ip, dest_port FROM
(
SELECT count("action") as "blocked" FROM "autogen"."tail_ip_block_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "action" = 'block' AND "direction" = 'out' and protocolid =~ /^(6$|17$)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY src_ip,dest_ip,dest_port
)  WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT TOP("blocked",10),src_ip,dest_ip, protocol FROM
(
SELECT count("action") as "blocked" FROM "autogen"."tail_ip_block_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "action" = 'block' AND "direction" = 'in' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY src_ip,dest_ip,protocol
)  WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT count("action") as "blocked" FROM "autogen"."tail_ip_block_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "action" = 'block' AND "direction" = 'in') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY protocol
SELECT count("action") as "blocked" FROM "autogen"."tail_ip_block_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "action" = 'block' AND "direction" = 'out') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY protocol

SELECT TOP("blocked",10),src_ip,dest_ip, protocol FROM
(
SELECT count("action") as "blocked" FROM "autogen"."tail_ip_block_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "action" = 'block' AND "direction" = 'out' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY src_ip,dest_ip,protocol
)  WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT mean("rtt") FROM "gateways" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "gateway_name" =~ /^$Gateway$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "gateway_name" fill(null)
SELECT "gwdescr", "source", "monitor", "defaultgw", "status", "substatus", "interface" FROM "gateways" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "gateway_name" LIMIT 1
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) *8 FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$LAN_Interfaces$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pf" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: pfSense
list.name: Host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pf" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "device" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.name: Disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "device" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "gateways" WITH KEY = "gateway_name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.name: Gateway
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "gateways" WITH KEY = "gateway_name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.label: LAN
list.name: LAN_Interfaces
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ and cpu !~ /cpu-total/
list.name: CPU
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ and cpu !~ /cpu-total/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "netchecker" WITH KEY = "ip"
list.name: Sensor

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "netchecker" WITH KEY = "ip"
